'''Old Merc's Pal''' is a 2-Star [[claymore]].

==Description==
He would often mention the experiences that he had in his youth as an adventurer.<br />
They were always the same old long-winded, annoying tall tales.<br />
But this old greatsword seems to silently say,<br />
"Well, it is a bit over the top, yes. But I was there too, you know."
